title: Debasing Themselves for Johnson (with Tim Farron MP)
itunes:title: Debasing Themselves for Johnson (with Tim Farron MP)
description:
Tim Farron, Liberal Democrat MP, says Boris Johnson should resign over breaking lockdown rules. He tells Bloomberg's Caroline Hepker and Yuan Potts that Tory MPs will be forced to debase and humiliate themselves in a whipped vote on Thursday about whether the PM deliberately misled parliament.

Plus: Bloomberg's Therese Raphael discusses why the Home Secretary is pursuing offshore refugee processing in Rwanda.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
